title: AHS Apocalypse Trailer Reaction
author: MaryGirl Moody
comment: THEORY IDEA- So remember how the coven title sequences revealed stuff about the characters' destiny? ie Misty's name dissolved into dust,  Kathy Bates had a cat which is a witch's familiar with numerous lives etc Emma Roberts title featured a witch kissing the devil's ass. What if she is brought back for some reason, survives the apocalypse and because either the antichrist has something she wants or because she hates the witches for what they did to her she betrays them and goes in cahoots with the antichrist? Literally kissing ass to the devil
Me thinks Venable bought the murder house and that’s where the bunker is.
Lana Del Rey should be a Witch in this season
The one thing Satan didn't anticipate: Madison Montgomery kicking him and his son's asses. Our witch queen will conquer.
Mary: you mentioned the apocalypse is going to be biblical based so I’m curious how will the 4 horsemen manifest? Will it be mere events or characters? (Venable?)
